data: Bob Lee is an early-stage investor in technology startups.
Bob Lee has been investing in technology startups for over eight years.
Bob Lee focuses investment efforts on SaaS, AI, and enterprise software.
Bob Lee has backed four Series A funding rounds in the past two years.
Bob Lee mentors startup founders through accelerator programs.
Bob Lee regularly speaks at industry events.
Bob Lee is based in Palo Alto, California, United States.
